doc:
Sam Allen (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sam_Allen_(actor) 0 Keith Howell Charles Allen (born 2 September 1953) is a British actor, comedian, musician, singer-songwriter, artist, author, and television presenter. He is the father of singer Lily Allen and actor Alfie Allen, and brother of actor and director Kevin Allen. Keith_Howell_Charles_Allen ( born 2_September_1953 ) is a_British_actor , comedian , musician , singer-songwriter , artist , author , and television_presenter . He is the_father of singer_Lily_Allen and actor_Alfie_Allen , and brother of actor_and_director_Kevin_Allen .
